original_title: Chinese spacesuit reaches 20 spacewalks, extending in-orbit lifespan
article_summary: Chinese spacesuit B, worn by astronauts during spacewalks, has reached 20 spacewalks, making it the first of its kind on China's space station to meet the goal of supporting 20 spacewalks within 4 years. The second-generation Feitian extravehicular spacesuit offers key technological advances, including a longer lifespan, improved safety, and efficient support for astronaut operations.</s>
